title: T206 Detroit Tigers lot (Inc. Cobb, Crawford, Jennings) ** SOLD
author: jasonc

posts.post_title: T206 Detroit Tigers lot (Inc. Cobb, Crawford, Jennings) ** SOLD
posts.post_content:
For the collector who is not concerned with condition.

A lot T206 Detroit Tigers, at this time only want to sell it as a lot.

Includes:
Cobb (Bat on) Poor, marked up back
Crawford (Batting) Poor, paper loss on back, but good eye appeal, could be trimmed on bottom?, EPDG Back
Crawford (Throwing) Trimmed
Includes 3 Jennings (Trimmed/Poor condition)

23 Cards total


*** SOLD ***
Shipping/PP Fee included for the lot.
Paypal goods please.
